english.segment1: If it had not been for the Lord. I don't know. If it had not been for the Lord. I don't know
english.segment2: I can't take no credit for where I am today. That would be silly of me. But I've been guilty of getting beside myself. Doin things my way. Makin a mess I confess. That I'm so undeserving ya'll. No I'm not worthy at all. For some reason He chose me. To be a voice for Him. To make some noise for Him. Clearly He saw somethin I didn't see
english.segment3: If it had (had) not (not) been (been) for the Lord. (I don't know) I don't know (don't know). If it had (had) not (not) been (been) for the Lord (for the Lord). I don't know (Ohhhhh)
english.segment4: Could have been the topic of some breakin news. But He kept His hand on my life. And sometimes I forget to say thank you. For the things that He's done. Like giving His son. So undeserving ya'll. No I'm not worthy at all. For some reason He chose me. To be a voice for Him. To make some noise for Him. Clearly He saw somethin I didn't see
english.segment5: If it had (not) not (not been oooo) been for the Lord (for the Lord). I don't know (ehhhh). If it had (had not been) not been for the Lord (the Lord). I don't know (don't know)
english.segment6: I know what I'm talking bout. Take little voice and open your mouth. Tell Him have you waited for the Lord. Excuse me that's what I was made for
english.segment7: If it had (had) not (not) been (been) for the Lord (for the Lord). I don't know (don't know where I would be). If it had (had not been Ohhho) not been for the Lord. (I don't like to think about it don't know where I'd be without Him). I don't know. If it had (uh) not (oh) been (been) for the Lord (Oooo). I don't know (don't know where I would be). If it had (oo) not (oo) been (been) for the Lord (for the Lord). I don't know (I don't know but I'm glad he did)
